info.title: DeskDirector
info.description: DeskDirector automates and accelerates ticket-based workflows between Users and Techs working IT services. The DeskDirector connector is a deep and powerful integration into our rich ticketing platform. All phases of a ticketâ€™s life cycle can be automated and enhanced for superior service experience.

post.description: Find companies by keywords or filters.

get.description: This operation returns a company's details.

post.description: Find contacts by keywords or filters.

get.description: This operation returns a contact's details.

post.description: This operation generates an HTML document from a dynamic email template. Dynamic email templates can be managed in your admin portal.

get.description: This operation returns the form entry by the form result ID.

post.description: Find members by keywords or filters.

get.description: This operation returns a member's details.

post.summary: Send a notification to a contact
post.description: This operation sends a notification to a contact in the client portal.

post.summary: Send a notification to a member
post.description: This operation sends a notification to a member in the tech portal.

get.description: This operation returns a ticket's details.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the ticket.

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the ticket.

post.summary: Send a system message in chat
post.description: This operation sends a system message in a chat session.
This operation invites users to a chat session.

delete.description: This operation deletes a chat workflow.

get.summary: Get create chat workflow parameter schema
get.description: This operation returns the schema of the create chat workflow parameters.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of event to subscribe to.

get.summary: Get chat webhook trigger dynamic schema
get.description: This operation returns the schema of the chat webhook payload content.
This operation returns a list of company teams.
This operation tests the connector connection.
This operation returns the schema of the given type.
This operation returns a list of email templates.
This operation returns the schema of a email template dynamic tokens.

This operation returns a list of ticket workflow events.
This operation returns a list of chat webhook events.

get.summary: Get ticket webhook trigger dynamic schema
get.description: This operation returns the schema of the ticket webhook payload content.
This operation returns the schema of the advanced ticket filters.

This operation returns a list of workflows.

This operation returns the schema of the create workflow parameters.

post.summary: When a chat session is created or updated
post.description: This operation triggers when a chat is created or updated.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of event to subscribe to.

post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work, create or update a chat.

post.summary: When a ticket is created or updated
post.description: This operation triggers when a ticket is created or updated.

post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work, create or update a ticket.

post.description: This operation triggers when the specified workflow is triggered. Workflows can be managed in your admin portal.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the workflow

post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work, trigger the specified workflow. Workflows need to be setup in admin portal.
